name: Bad Japco
description:
🇬🇧

Just get the apple! This game is a simple platformer. Or is it?

Bad Japco A Sensei Game Jam 2020 game by
  • Iwo Bujkiewicz (itch.io) - programming
  • Damian Kubik (itch.io) - art, maybe programming
  • Piotr Masek (itch.io) - programming

Music by soundcloud.com/LasDesu (CC BY 3.0)

Jam theme was "Don't trust the game". There were no requirements or restrictions on engines, tools, genres, etc.

Controls

WASD/arrows - movement
Space - jump

Maybe gamepad controls work too, who knows?

🇵🇱

Po prostu zdobądź japco! Ta gra to prosty platformer. Chociaż czy na pewno?

Sterowanie

WASD/strzałki - poruszanie się
Spacja - skok

Kto wie, może na gamepadach też działa?
